p: DEGs that are significantly associated with TME were used to construct the PPI network to analyze the modelâ€™s intrinsic function. The PPI network construction was based on the STRING database ( https://string-db.org/), and we subsequently applied Cytoscape software (version:3.8.0) for the reconstruction and visualization of the network. Nodes with the confidence of an interactive relationship > 0.7 were used for building the network.
